description.value:
By 10th level, when you hit a creature with your natural weapons while you are raging, the beast within you can curse your target with rabid fury. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw (DC equal to 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Constituion modifier) or suffer one of the following effects (your choice):

  • The target must use its reaction to make a melee attack against another creature of your choice that you can see.
  • The target takes a number of d12 equal to your Rage Damage plus your Rage Damage, as shown on the Rage Damage column of the Barbarian table psychic damage.

You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

activation.condition: when you hit a creature with your natural weapons while you are raging
